directions: Pour broth into the bottom of a slow cooker. Add chicken breasts. Pour spaghetti sauce over chicken. Layer pepperoni and jalapeno slices on top.
Cook on Low until chicken is cooked through, 4 to 5 hours.
Divide spaghetti among 4 serving plates. Lay mozzarella cheese slices over spaghetti. Divide chicken mixture among plates.
title: Slow Cooker Chicken Pepperoni
